name: European Facial
description: European Facial combines steam, exfoliation, massage, cleansing, and masks to
be as relaxing as it is beautifying. The results afterwards are immediately noticeable
, and patients leave the spa with brighter, softer skin.

name: Deep Pore Cleansing Facial
description: A deep pore cleansing facial is a treatment involving a 3 steps procedure that
penetrates your skin deeply to remove dirt and debris that accumulates in your pores.
This treatment is the best solution to achieve a clear, radiant complexion.

name: Customized Facial
description: Custom facials use products and techniques that precisely fit your skincare concerns.
Custom facials can address a variety of needs ranging from premature aging and environmental
damage to acne flare-ups to a dull and patchy complexion. When it comes to our skin,
sometimes it's tough to face the facts.

name: Powder Brow Technique aka Ombre
description: Powder Brows uses and ultra-fine tattoo needle and a Permanent Makeup (PMU) Device to deliver
pigment to the skin. Powder Brows are sometimes referred to or called "Ombre Brows". Powder
Brows result in a look most like makeup powder, hence the name "Powder Brows".

name: Lip Shading
description: Lip shading, also called lip blushing or lip tattooing, is a semi-permanent cosmetic procedure
that can change the color and the shape of your lips. To create this effect, and aesthetician uses
tiny needles to deposit a pigment in your lips through a process called pixelation.

name: Waxing
description: Eyebrows, upper lip, chin, jawline, cheeks, arms, legs (toes included).

name: And more...
description: reach out for up to date info...
